changes.title: Balance Validation Display Fix
changes.description: Fixed insufficient balance warning to appear immediately in purchase modal instead of separate popup.
details: Move balance warning to display inline at top of purchase confirmation modal
Show insufficient balance warning immediately when modal opens
Add proper timing to ensure DOM elements are rendered before validation
Remove separate insufficient balance modal popup
Disable Confirm Purchase button and change text when balance insufficient
Add debug logging to track balance validation process

changes.title: Balance Validation Before Purchase
changes.description: Added automatic account balance checking before confirming number purchases to prevent insufficient fund errors.
details: Check account balance against total purchase cost before showing confirmation modal
Display insufficient balance warning modal with current balance, required amount, and shortage
Provide direct link to Vonage dashboard for account top-up
Add comprehensive styling for balance summary and action suggestions
Log balance validation events for complete audit trail
Prevent accidental purchases when account funds are insufficient

changes.title: Enhanced Help Documentation
changes.description: Expanded the Features section in help with comprehensive details about all tool capabilities.
details: Added 8 detailed feature categories with icons and descriptions
Documented multi-user session management and account dashboard features
Detailed advanced search, purchase system, and cancellation processes
Explained real-time monitoring and cross-platform compatibility
Added security and reliability information for user confidence
